body.name: Dzees Solar Powered Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor WiFi, 1080P Color Night Vision Outdoor Camera, Wireless Home Security Cameras System with Solar Panel, Spotlight/Alarm, AI Detection, 2-Way Talk
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 17 mins
features: 🌞100% Wire-Free & Eco-Friendly Solar Powered: Powered by built-in rechargeable batteries, Dzees outdoor camera ensures non-stop performance even in the absence of power outlets. The upgraded antenna ensures stable WiFi connection, eliminating the need for cables or offline devices.

🤖Advanced AI Human, Pet, & Vehicle Detection: With AI technology, Dzees security camera can distinguish humans, pets, and vehicles. The Dzees Home App allows you to customize the monitoring target and get accurate detection with fewer false alerts.

🎥True 1080P HD Live Video & Color Night Vision: Watch true color 1080P FHD day and night, up to 33ft in the dark with Dzees outdoor security camera. You can view videos from your Android or iOS device, and use the advanced multi-channel viewing function to watch up to 6 cameras simultaneously.

🚨Smart Siren & Real-Time Alerts: Dzees outdoor camera sends instant alerts to your phone via the Dzees Home App when motion is detected. You can take action immediately, such as sounding the siren or talking directly to anyone through the 2-way audio.

🎁Great New Year Gift: Dzees Home offers a 30-day free trial of Dzee Smart for cloud recording, object detection, and more. Up to 20 cameras. With Amazon's 30-day free return policy, this eco-friendly security camera is a risk-free purchase. Share with up to 8 family members and protect your home together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Solar Powered Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor Why Dzees CG6K Solar Panel Security Camera？ The solar panel will charge Dzees security camera outdoor with direct sunlight. No circuit wiring hassles, you can place it anywhere. The solar outdoor camera wireless is also equipped with battery inside, which provides extra 2-3 months backup battery life. 180 days Non-stop power to keep an eye on what matters. Keeping 2.4GHz WiFi on, you will never miss a thing under Field of View of the home security cameras. Solar Panel wireless outdoor security cameras are just a small step in our green life.

Dzees CG6 Cam with Solar Panel, 100% Wire-free Outdoor Solar Power Security Camera System 100% Wireless & Cordless Installation - Work great with Solar Panel and 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. 3-Day Free Secure Cloud Storage - If free cloud plan can’t meet your demand, you can choose other right paid plan or Micro SD Card. Smart AI Recognition with behavior - Protect your property and send timely and accurate alerts. Free Dzees Home Mobile App - Live view, playback and download record manually videos. IP65 Weatherproof-The IP65 rating ensures that come rain or shine, your property is protected. Security-focused Hardware - With a sturdy material, Dzees wireless security camera outdoor is tested to use for over 3 years. Online firmware upgrade - Firmware maintenance will be launched on a regular basis to upgrade the function and experience.Trade-in for life.

Smart Wireless Security Camera System Protection for Every Home and Family Instant Alerts - Receive notifications for people, vehicles, and packages so you can react quickly, right from your phone. 90dB Siren Alarm - Trigger your siren automatically, or manually from the Dzees Home App to ward off unwanted guests. Respond quickly - Hear and speak to visitors with clear, 2-way audio. Essential Spotlight - With Spotlight , you can see important features in full color.

Advanced AI Recognition Technology Build your powerful wireless cameras for home security. Customized Detection Draw an Activity Zone to customize the area in which motion is detected. Exclude busy pedestrian areas or roads to reduce the number of false alerts you receive. Reduce unwanted notifications with Activity Zones. Human Pets Vehicle Detection The smart outdoor security camera will identify humans, vehicles, pets. With AI, you can classify objects and choose one or more to receive instant alerts. So you only receive alerts you care about.

Whole Home Security， Every Angle Covered Device Sharing-Simultaneous Live View for 10 Users 10 users can have access to the security system at the same time. You can share access with 10 neighbors, friends or family members, having live view simultaneously via the Dzees Home App. Enhanced WiFi Antenna-No Worry about Offline I know you are very worried about finding your home camera offline during your trip but believe a stronger wifi antenna allows Dzees security camera outdoor to have a more stable connection. Remote Access Anywhere, Anytime Use free Dzees Home App to live view, playback and download recorded clips manually anytime. According to statistics, a family usually needs 3-5 outdoor cameras. 100% wireless design allows you to set up 3-5 wireless outdoor camera in 10 minutes.

Protects You, Your Family, and Your Privacy Military-grade AES-256 Local Encryption The wireless security camera supports local 128 GB Micro SD card. When the SD card is full, the new video will automatically overwrite the old video. Encrypted AWS Cloud 30-day's free trail of cloud service: Cloud storage, intelligent notification for people, pets & vehicles and customized activity zones monitoring.You can decide whether to subscribe to advanced features after 30 days of free trial.Rolling 3-days free cloud storage：You can view the stored cloud videos and audio recordings for up to 3 days with Rolling 3 day Cloud Recordings. No Monthly Fees.All devices share a Pro-Account：With one subscription, all your wireless outdoor camera have access to the optional smart service (AI Object Detection, Activity Zone, 60-days cloud Recording, Up to 10G).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional outdoor security camera
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After a full month of use, I'm very impressed with this camera and the app that goes with it. Dzees is a brand related to Zumimall, and I already own 3 outdoor cameras from Zumimall. The quality and price were outstanding so I thought I would try this new model. Out of the box, I could tell this has a quality build by appearance and weight. I made an unboxing video, but you can only upload 1 video per review and I thought the notification / app launch video provided more value. To summarize what I omitted, you get everything you need to charge and install the camera. No surprises.Installation was simple and provides plenty of versatility, see the photo of how I have mine positioned. The picture quality is very good, though mine is poised to capture events at 15+ ft.My favorite and least favorite thing here is the app. The Dzees app has more advanced functionality than the CloudEdge app that I use for my other wireless WiFi cameras. Both are easy to use, but the Dzees app allows you to set up Activity Zones, on par with other high-end motion cameras. This flexibility is great because at first, the camera kept thinking that my neighbor's mailbox was a person, so I was getting a lot of alerts :D I simply set up the Activity Zone around the mailbox and it's been smooth sailing. The app loads very quickly and the time from event, to notification, to viewing the event is about 10sec which is really pretty awesome. I attached a video of how quickly the event video loads once you tap the notification and my phone is 5 years old. This is the type of thing that user's care about, so I'm glad Dzees/Zumimall made this snappy.The only drawback is also the app. And this only applies if you've bought multiple cameras from Zumimall, like me. This is a separate app and it would be fantastic to have all my cameras from the same company in the same app. There is even an additional Zumimall app, making there 3 total app for outdoor cameras from the same company. All of them are really solid though, with intuitive UIs and great features.To utilize the AI Analysis available and the Activity Zones in the app you need a subscription. This also allows you to get longer cloud storage and it will identify people, vehicles and pets, which is pretty cool. I don't recall the price, but it was a few dollars / month and they have different tiers available.The battery lasted about a month on the initial charge, though I expect it to last twice as a long in the future given my current battery levels. I think this is related to all of the 'mailbox alerts' I was getting before fine-tuning my setup.Overall, I'm very happy with this camera and I would highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing camera for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of these cameras and so far, they have exceeded my expectations for a camera at this price range. The motion detection, audio quality, video quality, features such as spotlight and siren, and battery life have so far been great. I like the fact that these cameras can be standalone cameras without the need of another home base module, reducing the complexity of installation and operation. I've had two cameras for a good 3 months now, and they still operate and record smoothly.In addition, I got a 3rd camera about two weeks ago since I was happy with my 2 original ones. I charged this third one to 100% before installing it outdoors. For about 4-5 days, it recorded a lot of clips due to the location and the amount of movement in the area. I would say it recorded about 30-40 clips a day with an average duration of 30 seconds each. After about 5 days, battery dropped to 95%, which was very decent. I got a solar panel as pictured and installed it when the camera was 95%. In a matter of hours (camera was installed late night, and I checked battery life next day at 3pm), the camera was charged to 100%. I was really surprised that the solar panel charged so well in. spite of the camera usage. It's been almost one week, and with the same regular recording frequency and use, the camera is still at 100%. It's still fairly early to tell the longevity of the panel and how long it can perform this way, but I have to say that the panel and camera are working very well together. I think this is well worth it especially since I don't need to charge the camera as it's fine so far stand-alone with the solar panel. I've read it should decrease the frequency of having to charge, so I'm very surprised that I haven't had to charge it at all since it's at 100%.Having stated all the positives, the only one thing I wish could be improved is the motion detection. It seems that motion detection is very sensitive. When I first left it at "High" (default setting), it was recording constantly even when a tree branch moved slightly. I had to adjust it to Medium and it was still a little sensitive, but much better than before. It wasn't until the Activity Zone feature was enabled that I cropped out the tree and everything worked as I wanted. Now there aren't any "false" motion recordings.All in all, these are great cameras and I highly recommend them, especially with the solar panel to keep them charged up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works good. Nice picture. Solar panel iffy. UPDATE: BUY ANOTHER BRAND ! CUSTOMER SERVICE AWFUL
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Range of view is good. Solar panel doesn't seem to charge battery much. I created large windows of scheduled sleep for the camera to preserve battery life. I was hoping to never have to climb up and remove the camera for charging. It will last about 2 weeks with dogs in the yard.UPDATE: Bought a second one and had problems with the solar panel. (mismatched plug-in) These folks do everything they can to avoid you or reply with any message that makes sense. They will keep asking you questions to delay fixing a problem.Go buy a Ring.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality and gives a very good performance, easy to configure.
reviews.reviewText: For more than a week I have been testing the performance of this camera without the solar sensor and it is still at 100%. At first glance the detection is efficient and sensitive, image quality is very good. It easily detects my little dog and humans, but sometimes it has false alarms by tree shadows, night vision is good, the construction is very solid with a 2 year guarantee from Dzees which gives us very good service at customers, thanks to Kaia from Dzees.

reviews.reviewTitle: Camera giving quality pictures and ensuring securities
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I installed this outdoor security camera in my backyard. On the second day after my installation of the camera a first suspicious motion that the camera caught in my backyard is a squirrel. As shown in the attached video clip the video taken was pretty clear under a dark raining weather condition. Among the security cameras (both battery and hardwired powered) that I have used this security camera had an impressive performance, which is elaborated as follows.1. Due to its purely wire-free specialty, installation of the camera is extremely easy (mainly fixing the bracket with a few screws) and the place where the camera is installed is very flexible. For instance, I installed the camera on a pillar of my backyard fence.2. In addition to an adjustable bracket, on which the camera needs to be screwed, in the original camera package, a magnetic bracket, for which the camera can be fixed with magnetic force, is also included. I found the magnetic bracket is more convenient than the screwed bracket for the camera to be put on/off the bracket (for instance when need to charge the camera inside). After a particular test of the magnetic bracket, you are assured that magnetic attachment with the bracket is strong enough to fasten the camera that can face upward, or downward, and left or right directions.3. With the Dzees home app on my phone, connection or re-connection of the camera with wi-fi was very easy by following the guide book in the camera box. As directed in the book, I can only connect the camera with 2.4GHz wi-fi, and 5GHz wi-fi connection is not supported by the camera.4. This camera has a new place where an external micro-sd card slot and re-set button are located. You can find them after the back plastic case is squeezed off. I found this place of external storage card and re-set button can be more secure and protective from water damage than an old Dzees camera.5. The camera makes 20-second video recording at a time, which seems long enough for me to see anything suspicious. In addition, it provides free 7-days on-cloud access to video clips provided by the company. I did not pay any subscription fees to buy additional days (15/30/60 days) of video access.6. In addition to common features like ‘2-way audio’ and ‘sharing camera’, the camera app can set ‘Audible Alarm’ function in the audio setting menu and ‘Flashlight Alarm’ in the lighting setting menu. The camera can sound an alarm or keep flashing when detecting motions, and I found they are valuable features if you monitor your properties requiring highest security. Please note that some advanced features, like intelligent notifications and activity zone, were not included in the free ‘no plan’ service, you need pay subscription fees to buy these features.7. For night vision, the camera can use either infrared mode or white light mode. When the white light mode is used, the camera will turn on its spotlight at night, which drains its batter power faster. Therefore, from my personal use experience, the infrared mode of the night vision is recommended for the battery power to last longer. (BTW, the capacity of rechargeable battery is 5200mAh.)In view of my usage experience, this camera is a worth-to-have product giving high-quality pictures and ensuring securities with a good price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena imagen y fácil configuración. Falla constantemente y no puede usar todas las características.
reviews.reviewText: Se monta y configura muy fácil. Tiene buena imagen tanto de día como de noche. El panel solar mantiene la cámara funcionando sin problemas de batería. En alta sensibilidad detecte hasta el movimiento de los árboles y constantemente se activa.Lo malo es que la cámara después de unos días de uso, se desconecta de la aplicación y marca error por lo que hay que estarla reseteado casi cada tercer día. Parece que la lluvia hace que esto sea más frecuente. Al querer reducir las alarmas por la detección tan sensible, no hay forma de programar las zonas de detección, sin pagar la app, o incluso no deja activar grabación constante, solo graba cuando detecta movimiento. Tampoco cuenta con registro de falla o alarma de falla por lo que si no la revisas no sabes si está grabando y no hay manera de saber porque falla.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple to install and use. Works Well
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to install. Just screw camera and panel to a suitable position within wifi range. Alerts me when there is movement within the area. Can set to flash a light or sound an alarm if I want. Impressed with quality so far (about a month's usage)
